Name: zul-iqembulezifundi
Author: Iqembu Lezifundiswa, Mussa Muhammad Telela , Uthman Mfanafuthi Msomi, Moulana Abdur Rahman Chilipa, Haji Ibrahim Mondli Japhet Mthembu, Moulana Imran Ngcobo, Moulana Eshaaq Osman
Source: Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa(IDM), https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Oh Nina enikholwayo! Ayinganichezukisi ingcebo (umnotho) wenu nezingane zenu enkumbulweni kaMvelinqangi futhi noma ngabe ngubani owenza lokho ngakho-ke labo, bona bangabalahlekelweyo
Futhi sebenzisani kulokho esanabela kona ngaphambili kokuba ukufa kufike koyedwa wenu bese ethi, â€œNkosi yami kungani ungangiphumuzi okwesikhashana ukuze nginikele futhi ngibe ngomunye wabalungileyo
Futhi akasoze uMvelinqangi awunike ithuba umphefumulo uma sekufike isikhathi sawo, futhi uMvelinqangi uyakwazi lokho enikwenzayo
